content:
Hello, this is my first time in stabilizing a feature #76119,
So the final comment period finished 19 days ago.
Is there something I need to do as author which I don't know? Or what is it waiting for exactly?
looks like you're assigned to @nikomatsakis , they're often busy with many things. Hopefully this ping will bring it to their attention tomorrow :3
SO he need to approve to it?

after the final comment period is finished, pull requests and issues have to be manually merged and/or closed.
So there is no bot which does this for us, I am not even completely sure if we would want to use a bot for this
Thanks, it's ok I was just wondering if it's from my side.
No, I just fell very behind over last month or so, and I'm slowly starting to crawl my way out
I'll put this on my list for today, i'm planning to do some reviewing
